organisation_name: Pacific Islands Association of Non-Governmental Organisations (PIANGO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

goals__remit:
PIANGO is a regional network of Pacific CSOs with specific membership of national umbrella NGOs in 24 Pacific Island countries and territories. PIANGO assists Pacific NGOs to initiate action, give voice to their concerns and work collaboratively with other development actors for just and sustainable development.  
PIANGO's vision is "Strong and Effective NGO and civil society sector for a just and peaceful Pacific.  
Our mission is to"Advocate for and provide technical support on CSO Accountability, foster recognition of the critical role of CSOs to influence positive change for development effectiveness in the communities they serve. 
PIANGO's objective are: 
i) facilitate active networking among NGOs at all levels throughout the region 
ii) promote and enable access to sharing and dissemination of information, ideas, experiences, resources among NGOs throughout the region 
iii) enhance the capacity of NGOs to better understand and fulfil and develop their roles and functions 
iv) assist in identifying, monitoring and analysing the needs of Pacific people; 
v) provide a means for a collective voice and action on issues of concern to NGOs and the people they serve; 
vi) cooperate with other networks and organisations within and beyond the region that have similar objectives
